no_devices.title: No Devices Found
no_devices.description:
Could not find any Leaperkim EUC devices.

**Common causes:**
1. The device is **already connected** to another app (official app, WheelLog, etc) - BLE devices stop advertising when connected
2. The device is turned off
3. The device is out of Bluetooth range

**Solutions:**
- Close any apps that might be connected to the EUC
- Force stop the official app on your phone
- Restart the EUC (power off and on)
- Click **Submit** to scan again
- Enable **Manual Entry** to enter the MAC address directly
- Enable **Show All Devices** to see all Bluetooth devices for debugging

manual.title: Manual Device Entry
manual.description:
Enter the Bluetooth MAC address of your EUC.

You can find this by:
1. Using the official app
2. Running `bluetoothctl` and scanning for devices
3. Checking your phone's Bluetooth settings
